price: E aos que desmentem Nossos sinais, tocá-los-á o castigo pela perversidade que cometiam.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡسُقُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā yamassuhumu al-ʿadhābu bimā kānū yafsuqūna
